title: 3. The form (Form F12) set out in Part 1 of the Schedule is substituted for
heading: 1. (1) These Regulations may be cited as the Companies Act 2014 (Forms)
text_raw:
1. (1) These Regulations may be cited as the Companies Act 2014 (Forms) 

Regulations 2021. 

(2) These Regulations shall come into operation on 1 August 2021.
text_norm: 1 (1) regulation may cited company act 2014 (forms) regulation 2021 (2) regulation shall come operation 1 august 2021

title: 3. The form (Form F12) set out in Part 1 of the Schedule is substituted for
heading: In these Regulations, “Regulations of 2015” means the Companies Act
text_raw:
2. 

In these Regulations, “Regulations of 2015” means the Companies Act 

2014 (Forms) Regulations 2015 (S.I. No. 147 of 2015).
text_norm: 2 regulation regulation 2015 mean company act 2014 (forms) regulation 2015 (s.i no 147 2015)

title: 3. The form (Form F12) set out in Part 1 of the Schedule is substituted for
heading: 4. The form (Form F13) set out in Part 2 of the Schedule is substituted for
text_raw:
4. The form (Form F13) set out in Part 2 of the Schedule is substituted for 

the form set out in Part 63 of the Schedule of the Regulations of 2015. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 30th July, 2021. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 Regulation 3

title: 3. The form (Form F12) set out in Part 1 of the Schedule is substituted for
heading: (This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation.) 

The purpose of these Regulations is to prescribe amended forms for the purposes 
of sections 1302(2) and 1304(1) of the Companies Act 2014. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 14 [396]
